title: Ortho-quinone methide driven synthesis of kynurenic acid lactams
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22123-22131
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04341C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Julián Robin Sárik, Anasztázia Hetényi, Róbert Berkecz, István Szatmári, Bálint Lőrinczi
Lactam formation of different KYNA amides and Mannich bases mediated by ortho-quinone methide has been investigated.
